name: Fasori Oregano Whole Leaves 4 oz (113 g) – Premium Dried Oregano, Aromatic Mediterranean Herb for Italian Cooking, Pizza, Pasta & Sauces
short_description: Premium Dried Oregano Leaves – Carefully harvested and dried whole oregano for bold, earthy flavor and aroma. Perfect for Italian, Mediterranean, Mexican, Greek, and Middle Eastern cooking.
4 oz Value Jar – Bulk container ideal for home chefs, restaurants, catering, pizzerias, food trucks, and meal prep kitchens. Resealable PET plastic jar keeps herbs fresh and aromatic.
Essential Cooking Herb – Use in pizza, pasta, tomato sauce, marinara, lasagna, salads, soups, chili, stews, roasted vegetables, chicken, fish, lamb, beef, bread dips, and seasoning blends.
Versatile Pantry Staple – Combine with garlic, basil, thyme, rosemary, parsley, sage, cumin, paprika, and chili flakes to create authentic seasoning mixes and rubs for grilling and roasting.
All-Natural & Non-GMO – Gluten-free, vegan, no MSG, no preservatives, keto and paleo friendly. High-quality oregano leaves packaged in the USA for reliable flavor and freshness.

name: Mediterranea Products Greek Oregano – Traditionally Dried & Hand-Picked Premium Oregano Leaves – 100% Natural Dried Oregano Direct from Greek Farmers (25 Grams)
short_description: 🎀Premium Quality: Our Greek Oregano is hand-picked at peak freshness to ensure the highest quality and flavor potency. Carefully selected from trusted growers in Greece, each leaf embodies the essence of the Mediterranean. Cultivated in the fertile soil and optimal climate of Greece, our Greek Oregano thrives in its natural habitat, ensuring superior quality and flavor.

🎀Intense Flavor Profile: Known for its robust and peppery flavor, Greek Oregano delivers a distinctive taste that complements a wide range of dishes. Whether sprinkled over pizzas, tossed in salads, or infused in sauces, its aromatic notes enhance the overall culinary experience. Transport your taste buds to the shores of Greece with every sprinkle of our Greek Oregano, capturing the essence of Mediterranean cuisine in your kitchen.

🎀Versatile Culinary Ingredient: From classic Greek dishes like moussaka and souvlaki to Italian favorites such as pasta sauces and bruschetta, Greek Oregano adds depth and complexity to various cuisines. Elevate your cooking repertoire with this versatile herb. From marinades and rubs to dressings and dips, Greek Oregano enhances the flavor profile of countless recipes, making it a go-to ingredient for home cooks and professional chefs alike.

🎀Freshness Guaranteed: Each leaf is carefully hand-selected to guarantee only the finest specimens make it into our packaging, ensuring consistent quality and taste. Our Greek Oregano ensures long-lasting freshness and potency. Sealed for freshness, it retains its flavor profile, allowing you to enjoy the authentic taste of Greece in every sprinkle.

🎀Non-GMO and Gluten-Free: Our Greek Oregano is free from genetically modified organisms (GMOs) and gluten, making it suitable for a wide range of dietary preferences and restrictions. Elevate everyday meals with the bold and aromatic flavor of Greek Oregano, turning simple dishes into culinary masterpieces that delight the senses.
🎀Customer Satisfaction Guarantee: We are committed to your satisfaction. If for any reason you are not fully satisfied with our Greek Oregano, please contact us for a refund or replacement.

name: Spice Classics Oregano Leaves, 1.75 lb - One 1.75 Pound Container of Dried Oregano Leaves for Back-of-House Use, Perfect for Pastas, Pizza Sauces, Marinades, Vegetables and More
short_description: ROBUST FLAVOR: Spice Classics Oregano provides a robust flavor that develops throughout the cooking process

QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Sourced explicitly for chefs, these dried oregano leaves are carefully selected to ensure they add visual appeal and enhance the flavor profile of many other spices and seasonings
MADE FOR PROFESSIONAL KITCHENS: With a wide mouth and handle for easy transportation, the spice container is easy to use whether you store oregano in bulk or dispense it into a smaller container

CONSISTENT, VERSATILE FLAVOR: Use Spice Classics Oregano Leaves to enjoy consistent flavor performance in a wide range of traditional and innovative dishes, such as sauces and dry rubs, or to complement poultry, seafood and vegetable dishes
SAFELY SOURCED: Spice Classics spices, herbs and seasonings are globally sourced so you can feel good about serving flavors of the world to all your patrons
product_description: Spice Classics Oregano Leaves are extremely versatile, making them a go-to herb in any kitchen. Oregano is an essential ingredient in many kitchens and adds a fresh flavor to savory dishes. Spice Classics Oregano Leaves are ideal for chefs in professional kitchens, catering services and cafeterias and will bring a unique and aromatic taste to many different dishes on your menu. Unlike other herbs, oregano has a flavor that develops throughout the cooking process, so chefs can add oregano early in their recipes. Spice Classics Oregano Leaves will pack a punch in dishes without caring for and maintaining fresh oregano leaves. Dried oregano also lasts longer, allowing you to buy Spice Classics Oregano Leaves in bulk and use it as a garnish or main ingredient in dishes on your schedule. Since oregano spice is a versatile ingredient, you can use it alone to create a complex flavor or pair it with complementary seasoning partners such as garlic, thyme, onion, basil, olive oil and parsley. Spice Classics Oregano Leaves are a versatile dry ingredient for high-productivity kitchens. Because the oregano spice is ready for immediate use, you can measure the amount you need directly from the container and add flavor to your dishes quickly. Use oregano leaves in any recipe in which you would use its fresh alternative. Some meal options include savory dishes such as chicken oregano with garlic and tomatoes or Chilean sea bass with oregano pesto. Oregano also works well inside dishes like lemony Greek potatoes or garlic oregano zucchini. No matter how you use Spice Classic Oregano Leaves, the result will be a flavorful dish with unique flavors that leave your guests coming back for more.

short_description: WAFT OF OREGANO PIZZAZZ : Spices and herbs are literally divine gifts, and Eastanbul is thrilled to meet its customers with another meticulously selected exquisite goodness, gathered from the bountiful lands of Turkey: Dried Oregano, celebrated for its bold, peppery taste with a hint of sweetness and a robust, aromatic intensity that lingers pleasingly on the palate

VERSATILE & FARM FRESH FLAVOR ENHANCER : Oregano seasoning, key in Greek, Italian, and Turkish cuisines in particular, elevates soups, sauces, dressings, and marinades with its unique, herbaceous aroma. Essential in pizzas, spaghetti, roasts, and grilled veggies, It harmonizes with chicken, beef, pork, lamb, and fish. Oregano leaf also stars in herb-infused oils, breads, herbal tea recipes, and various spice mixes. The list is never exhaustive!

100% NATURAL : Comes from Turkey which dominates the production in the world with its phenomenal quality oregano selection. Our intoxicating, top culinary grade freshly dried,oregeno is vegan, Non-Adultered, Non-GMO, Non-MSG, Non-Irradiated, and free from harmful chemicals and preservatives. Eastanbul Oragino comes in a sealed PET bottle with a handy shaker top, ensuring ease of use and storage. Perfectly suitable for grinding into ground oregano
SPICE PAIRINGS : Oregano pairs well with basil, garlic, and rosemary, enhancing Mediterranean dishes. It's commonly used alongside olive oil but works well with sesame oil for a unique, nutty taste.

SPICE MATTERS! Our brand embraces responsible manufacturing, material transparency, and workplace diversity and is committed to the utmost customer satisfaction standards. Eastanbul %100 stands behind its authentic spices

name: Badia Oregano Whole, 5.5 oz – Dried Oregano Leaves, Herb Seasoning – Aromatic and Flavorful
short_description: Badia Whole Oregano delivers a warm, slightly bitter, and peppery flavor that’s essential in countless recipes. It’s a key herb for Italian, Latin, and Mediterranean cuisines, enhancing sauces, meats, and more
Whole oregano leaves maintain more essential oils than crushed varieties, offering superior flavor and fragrance. Simply crush between your fingers when cooking to release its full aromatic potential
Use it in tomato sauces, pizza, roasted vegetables, salad dressings, stews, grilled meats, and even homemade spice blends. It’s a staple in everything from marinara to adobo to herb butter
Packaged to preserve its natural oils and fragrance, Badia Whole Oregano stays fresh longer. Convenient resealable container makes storage easy
Trusted Heritage: Badia Spices, a family-owned company since 1967, has built a global reputation for providing premium, authentic seasonings inspired by rich culinary traditions from around the world
product_description: This native Mediterranean region herb is widely used as a seasoning in Greek, Spanish and Italian cooking. Idea as a distinctive flavor in salad dressing and as a main ingredient in tomato based sauces, grilled meat, poultry and shellfish.
